name: Loop Finder
description:
Loop Finder is a sound-driven game, an experiment about orienting and navigating almost random-generated environments only through sound.

The more you get closer to the source of the sound, the more complex and rich it gets. In order to succeed you'll have to dodge the bombs, by listening to their ticking.

Sticking to this theme, graphics are reduced to a minimum, the bare essential.

CONTROLS

  • WASD / Joypad to move
  • SPACE to pause

All art, game mechanics, and sounds made by me.
